required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Postoperative Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Upper Urinary Urothelial Carcinoma With Lymphovascular Invasion
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial for Postoperative Adjuvant Chemotherapy for pTanyN0M0 Upper Urinary Urothelial Carcinoma With Lymphovascular Invasion

brief_summary.textblock: This project is to explore the effect of adjuvant chemotherapy on total tumor survival time, progression-free survival time, and recurrence-free survival time in patients with pTanyN0M0 upper urinary urothelial carcinoma with lymphatic vascular invasion (LVI) through a prospective case-control study.

detailed_description.textblock: This project is to explore the effect of adjuvant chemotherapy on total tumor survival time, progression-free survival time, and recurrence-free survival time in patients with pTanyN0M0 upper urinary urothelial carcinoma with lymphatic vascular invasion (LVI) through a prospective case-control study. Therapeutic value of adjuvant chemotherapy for LVI(+) patients with pT1N0M0, pT2N0M0, and pT3-4N0M0 upper urinary urothelial carcinoma, respectively.

primary_outcome.description: Effect of postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy on total tumor survival time

secondary_outcome.description: Effect of postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy on progression-free survival time

other_outcome.description: Effect of postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy on relapse-free survival time

arm_group.arm_group_label: Effect of adjuvant chemotherapy on pTanyN0M0 UTUC with LVI
arm_group.description: This project is to explore the effect of adjuvant chemotherapy on total tumor survival time, progression-free survival time, and recurrence-free survival time in patients with pTanyN0M0 upper urinary urothelial carcinoma with lymphatic vascular invasion (LVI) through a prospective case-control study. Therapeutic value of adjuvant chemotherapy for LVI(+) patients with pT1N0M0, pT2N0M0, and pT3-4N0M0 upper urinary urothelial carcinoma, respectively.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Effect of placebo on pTanyN0M0 UTUC with lymphatic invasion
arm_group.description: As a control, this clinical trial also set up a placebo control group. The effect of adjuvant chemotherapy was obtained by random grouping and comparing the effects of patients in the experimental group and the control group.

intervention.description: Standard GC (gemcitabine and cisplatin) regimen: gemcitabine 1000-1200mg/m2 intravenous infusion on days 1 and 8, cisplatin 70mg/m2 on the second day of intravenous infusion, every 3 weeks (21-day regimen) is a cycle, A total of 3 cycles.
intervention.arm_group_label: Effect of adjuvant chemotherapy on pTanyN0M0 UTUC with LVI

intervention.description: Use a placebo as a comparison
intervention.arm_group_label: Effect of placebo on pTanyN0M0 UTUC with lymphatic invasion

responsible_party.investigator_title: Deputy Director of Urology, Shandong Provincial Hospital
